availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David S. Eccles (Henry County, Kentucky, tailor)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, tailor. Ohio native. Married to Sarah "Sallie" J. Eccles. Father of John M. Eccles and Sarah "Sallie" Eccles. Tailor in Brownsville, Pennsylvania, in 1860. Employed Nancy Williams as a servant in Brownsville in 1860.Tailor in Henry County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Pennsylvania, Fayette County, Brownsville, p. 70.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 326B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Henry County, KY, August 1863, p. 65 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
